item.title: Mastering cURL for API Development and Testing
item.description: As a developer working with APIs, having a reliable and versatile tool for making HTTP requests is very essential. cURL, a powerful command-line utility, is the perfect companion for API development and testing. In this blog post, we’ll explore how to leverage cURL to streamline your API workflow. cool-beans 1. Understanding cURL Basics cURL is designed with minimal behavior by default, only performing the necessary actions unless instructed otherwise . To extend its functionality, you must explicitly add options .
